Posts.EditableText: Hi, all! The translation in French of Pixie's Combat1 library ( used in Quest's documentation ) is completed, unless I am mistaken of course. In the attached file you will find the library, renamed Combat1FR.aslx and Pixie's demo game, which I have re-created from scratch. As far as I can see, this seems to work. A very interesting and useful work, at least for me: I have learnt quite a lot of things, and I hope that others will find it useful, too. One small problem: the message that appears when the player is killed and has lost the game has not been translated in the French core library. How can I fix that? Thanks to you, Pixie Thierry

Hi, all!

The translation in French of Pixie's Combat1 library ( used in Quest's documentation ) is completed, unless I am mistaken of course. In the attached file you will find the library, renamed Combat1FR.aslx and Pixie's demo game, which I have re-created from scratch. As far as I can see, this seems to work.

A very interesting and useful work, at least for me: I have learnt quite a lot of things, and I hope that others will find it useful, too.
One small problem: the message that appears when the player is killed and has lost the game has not been translated in the French core library. How can I fix that?

Thanks to you, Pixie

Thierry
